header.headline: A different kind of venture group
header.subhead: We are willing to look deeper, wider, and bigger with all investment opportunities!
header.description:
CitySide Ventures is a driven venture group comprised of experienced business builders, die-hard serial entrepreneurs, disrupters, innovators, and technologists.

We are more than just traditional investors, we are a different investment management firm that creates and manages high-risk venture investment funds.

focus.headline: Our Focus
focus.description: Our investment group’s sole focus is to identify and fund scalable tech companies in a variety of stages, industries, and market verticals. We hold our portfolio companies to a high level of integrity and if your company is legal, morally, and ethically sound, we are ready to explore!

investments.headline: Our Investment Platforms
investments.description: We have created the following investment tracks to accommodate tech companies from a startup stage to navigate seamlessly between Angel Funding to Seed Capital to Growth Capital.

services.title: Early Stage Capital
services.description: $150K - $5M in available funding for early-stage investments in tech-based companies.

services.title: Technology Licensing
services.description: Complete licensing, deal-making and structuring, negotiating, and closing services.

services.title: Syndication & Fund Management
services.description: Join a large syndicate of investors to lower risk and increase investment success.

services.title: Venture Studio & Tech Lab
services.description: A complete technology development studio with top talent of today’s market.

portfolio.headline: Our Recent Investments
portfolio.description: Our diverse portfolio represents a progressive family of companies with a mission to balance and make a positive impact on everyday life with high potential of return on equity for its shareholders.
